ARABIC: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He knows everything in the heavens and earth. He knows what you keep secret and what you divulge. Allah knows what the heart contains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He knows what is in the heavens and the earth, and knows what you hide and what you disclose; God knows what is in the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He knows what is in the heavens and the earth, and knows what you conceal and what you disclose. Allah even knows what lies hidden in the breasts of people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He knows all that is in the heavens and the earth and all that you reveal or conceal. God knows best whatever the hearts contain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He knows all whatever is in the heavens and in the earth, and He knows all what you hide and all what you disclose; and Allah knows what lies within the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you reveal. And Allah is the All-Knower of what is in the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He knows what is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you hide and what you manifest; and Allah is Cognizant of what is in the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you publish. God knows the thoughts within the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He knoweth all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knoweth what ye conceal and what ye publish. And Allah is Aware of what is in the breasts (of men).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth. He knows all that you conceal and all that you reveal. God is aware of what is in your hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He knoweth whatsoever is In the heavens and the earth, and He knoweth whatsoever ye keep secret, and whatsoever ye make known; and Allah is the Knower of whatsoever is in the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He knows whatever there is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows whatever you hide and whatever you disclose, and Allah knows best what is in your breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth; and He knows what ye conceal and what ye reveal: yea, Allah knows well the (secrets) of (all) hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you reveal. And Allah is the All-Knower of what is in the breasts (of men).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth and He knows all what you conceal and what you reveal. Allah knows the innermost of the chests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He knows everything in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you reveal. And God knows what is within the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [64:4] He knows all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you hide and what you disclose, and God is Knower of what is in the breasts, in terms of the secrets and convictions they contain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He knoweth all that is in the heavens) of creation (and all that is in the earth) of created beings, (and He knoweth what ye conceal) of deeds (and what ye publish) of works (and Allah is Aware of what is in the breasts (of men)) He is Aware of what is in the hearts of good and evil.
